attributes.action: The goverment need to speed up the process of diagnosing Autistic Spectrum Disorders in children
attributes.additional_details:
The current system to check if a child has Autism is too long and drawn out. In may cases it can take up to 10 months after the initial enquiry which is not good enough. This delay can lead to the child having major problems in school and leaves the child and others at risk. Please sign if you agree

Thank you

rejection.details: Please see: Create a better pathway to diagnosis of an Autism Spectrum Disorder for both Adults and Children
